scripts.pre-build: cp manifest.json manifest-nightly.json && sed -i -E "s@(\"version\":\ *\"[0-9\.]+)\"@\1.0nightly"$(git rev-parse HEAD | tr -d -c 0-9 | cut -c 1-6)$BUILD_ID"\"@g" manifest-nightly.json && mv manifest.json manifest.json.ori && mv manifest-nightly.json manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run pre-build; web-ext sign --api-key $AMO_ISSUER --api-secret $AMO_SECRET --id $AMO_ID; npm run post-build
